name: outlook-calendar-api
description: API for Outlook Calendar App with MongoDB

scripts.predeploy: powershell -Command "@{commit=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD);buildTime=(Get-Date -Format o)} | ConvertTo-Json | Out-File -Encoding utf8 build-info.json; if(Test-Path backend.zip){Remove-Item backend.zip}; Compress-Archive -Path *.js,*.json,*.md,utils,services,csv-imports,.deployment,web.config -DestinationPath backend.zip"
scripts.deploy: npm run predeploy && az webapp deploy --resource-group DefaultResourceGroup-EUS --name emanuelnyc-services-api --src-path backend.zip --type zip
